fryspeaks: Space. It seems to go on and on forever. But then you get to the end and the gorilla starts throwing barrels at you.
Shut up and take my money!
I always thought at this point in my life _I'd_ be the one making the crank calls!
Wait a minute! Is that blimp accurate?
leelaspeaks: Well, at least here you'll be treated with dignity. Now strip naked and get on the probulator.
Can't we get away in the ship?
zoidbergspeaks: By the way, I took the liberty of fertilizing your caviar.
What? It’s not even scratch and sniff? But if rich people think it’s good, I’ll buy it. One art, please!
Ah yes, better. A lonely weekend in my dumpster with a jar of pennies and tears.
amyspeaks: This is why you never see a poor person with millions of dollars.
They never made wise use of the land. When my ancestor Reginald Wong landed here, they had no bingo parlors and only one prostitute.
morbospeaks: WINDMILLS DO NOT WORK THAT WAY!  Good night.
